duties_responsibilities.duty: Simulate real-world scenarios and emulate TTPs of real adversaries to improve the target environment using threat intelligence and the MITRE ATT&CK Framework.
Build and maintain red team infrastructure and automate functions where possible.
Research new offensive security tactics, techniques, and procedures.
Develop custom tools and tradecraft to automate tasks and increase team capabilities.
Execute advanced social engineering campaigns and provide subject matter expertise during incident investigations.
Effectively communicate findings, attack paths, and recommendations to technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Train other engineers in adversary simulation tactics and participate in intelligence-driven exercises.
Produce high-quality reports detailing exercise results, vulnerabilities, risks, and proposed mitigations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in computer science or related discipline (Master's preferred)
